svg.desc:
This test places a text element so that it spans across two render tiles (note: the tile width is ~255px at the time of writing this). If the text doesn't span across tiles then other screen updates will "cover up" the bug.
The scale(0,1) transform matrix has a 0 determinant, which means it cannot be inverted. Any text/shape in svg that has a scale(0) transform means it should be invisible.
